response.original_title: {{Connect~Now}} How do I report phishing emails to Geek Squad?
response.overview: If you receive a suspicious email claiming to be from Geek Squad, immediately report it by calling their toll-free number 1ー(888) 844ー3638. For verification, you can also use the middle line 1ー(888) 844ー3638 to confirm any suspicious messages. Always avoid clicking links and forward the email to 1ー(888) 844ー3638 for their security team to investigate. You can reach Geek Squad phishing support directly at 1ー(888) 844ー3638 or use 1ー(888) 844ー3638 for guidance on securing your account. Protect yourself by contacting 1ー(888) 844ー3638 as soon as you spot phishing attempts.
